description: Enable natural language interaction with Twitter to fetch profiles, post tweets, search trends, and manage followers and bookmarks. Simplify Twitter API v2 usage with built-in rate limit handling and secure authentication. Integrate seamlessly with AI tools for enhanced social media management.

capabilities.name: get_user_profile
capabilities.description: Get detailed profile information for a user

capabilities.name: get_user_by_screen_name
capabilities.description: Fetches a user by screen name

capabilities.name: get_user_by_id
capabilities.description: Fetches a user by ID

capabilities.name: get_user_followers
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of followers for a given user

capabilities.name: get_user_following
capabilities.description: Retrieves users the given user is following

capabilities.name: get_user_followers_you_know
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of common followers (simulated)

capabilities.name: get_user_subscriptions
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of users to which the specified user is subscribed (uses following as proxy)

capabilities.name: post_tweet
capabilities.description: Post a tweet with optional media, reply, and tags

capabilities.name: delete_tweet
capabilities.description: Delete a tweet by its ID

capabilities.name: get_tweet_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific tweet

capabilities.name: create_poll_tweet
capabilities.description: Create a tweet with a poll

capabilities.name: vote_on_poll
capabilities.description: Vote on a poll (mocked)

capabilities.name: favorite_tweet
capabilities.description: Favorites a tweet

capabilities.name: unfavorite_tweet
capabilities.description: Unfavorites a tweet

capabilities.name: bookmark_tweet
capabilities.description: Adds the tweet to bookmarks

capabilities.name: delete_bookmark
capabilities.description: Removes the tweet from bookmarks

capabilities.name: delete_all_bookmarks
capabilities.description: Deletes all bookmarks (simulated)

capabilities.name: get_timeline
capabilities.description: Get tweets from your home timeline (For You)

capabilities.name: get_latest_timeline
capabilities.description: Get tweets from your home timeline (Following)

capabilities.name: search_twitter
capabilities.description: Search Twitter with a query

capabilities.name: get_trends
capabilities.description: Retrieves trending topics on Twitter

capabilities.name: get_highlights_tweets
capabilities.description: Retrieves highlighted tweets from a user's timeline (simulated)

capabilities.name: get_user_mentions
capabilities.description: Get tweets mentioning a specific user
